void GrPolygonNode::SetOptimizeEnable ( bool  enabled  )  [inline]

tree optimization. Returns world space polygons in the group passed in. All polygons returned in worldPolygons are removed from the true. Returns true if all polygons in the hierarchy were placed in worldPolygons.
